fastq-run-ids.title: Run IDs (fastq ingress)
fastq-run-ids.description: List of run IDs present in reads.

fastq-basecallers.title: Basecalling models (fastq ingress)
fastq-basecallers.description: List of basecalling models referenced in the input files.

fastq-run-ids-per-file.title: Run ID counts (fastq ingress)
fastq-run-ids-per-file.description: File with run ID read counts.

fastq-basecallers-per-file.title: Basecallers counts (fastq ingress)
fastq-basecallers-per-file.description: TSV with per-file read counts grouped by basecaller.

read-stats-per-file.title: Per-file read stats (fastq ingress)
read-stats-per-file.description: A TSV with per-file read stats.

fastq-read-stats-hist-length.title: Read length histogram
fastq-read-stats-hist-length.description: A TSV of binned read length counts representing a histogram.

fastq-read-stats-hist-quality.title: Read quality histogram
fastq-read-stats-hist-quality.description: A TSV of binned read quality counts representing a histogram.

fastq-sample-data.title: Concatenated sequence data
fastq-sample-data.description: Per-sample reads concatenated into one FASTQ file.

fastq-metamap.title: Metadata JSON (fastq ingress)
fastq-metamap.description: Per-sample metadata used in the workflow as JSON.

xam-run-ids.title: Run IDs (xam ingress)
xam-run-ids.description: List of run IDs present in input reads.

xam-basecallers.title: Basecalling models (xam ingress)
xam-basecallers.description: List of basecaller models used to basecall input reads.

xam-n-seqs.title: Number of reads (xam ingress)
xam-n-seqs.description: Number of reads after running bamstats.

xam-run-ids-per-file.title: Run ID counts (xam ingress)
xam-run-ids-per-file.description: TSV file containing read counts grouped by run ID.

xam-basecallers-per-file.title: Basecalling model counts (xam ingress)
xam-basecallers-per-file.description: TSV with per-file basecaller read counts.

xam-flagstat-per-file.title: Alignment flag stat counts
xam-flagstat-per-file.description: TSV file containing alignment flag counts per contig.

xam-read-stats-hist-length.title: Read alignment length histogram
xam-read-stats-hist-length.description: A TSV of binned read length counts representing a histogram.

xam-read-stats-hist-quality.title: Read alignment quality histogram
xam-read-stats-hist-quality.description: A TSV of binned read quality counts representing a histogram.

xam-read-stats-hist-length-unmap-hist.title: Read alignment length histogram for unmapped reads
xam-read-stats-hist-length-unmap-hist.description: A TSV of binned unmapped read length counts representing a histogram.

xam-read-stats-hist-quality-unmap-hist.title: Read alignment quality histogram for unmapped reads
xam-read-stats-hist-quality-unmap-hist.description: A TSV of binned unmapped read quality counts representing a histogram.

xam-read-stats-hist-accuracy.title: Read alignment accuracy histogram
xam-read-stats-hist-accuracy.description: A TSV containing a histogram of the alignment accuracy of input reads.

xam-read-stats-hist-coverage.title: Read alignment coverage histogram
xam-read-stats-hist-coverage.description: A TSV containing a histogram of the alignment coverage of input reads.

sample-data-bam.title: BAM file
sample-data-bam.description: Per-sample reads merged and sorted in one BAM file.

sample-data-bai.title: BAM index file
sample-data-bai.description: BAM index file resulting from ingress.

xam-metamap.title: Metadata JSON (xam ingress)
xam-metamap.description: Per-sample metadata used in the workflow as JSON.
